at the break of God’s future
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: TIME IS A SPATIAL LANDSCAPE / THE FUTURE IS AN APPROACHING ENTITY
FAITH IS ABUNDANCE / SIN IS CONSUMERISM

kernfrasen: world in our very moment is sick to death
heal and overcome all of the past
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: THE WORLD IS A PATIENT / SALVATION IS HEALING

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: at the brink of newness that cannot quite be seen

mapping_structuur.bron_element: The edge of a physical space

cognitieve_implicaties: The hearer feels a sense of vertigo or anticipation.
The future is close but requires a 'leap' or a shift in perspective.
theologische_implicaties: Inaugurated eschatology: the Kingdom is 'at hand' but not yet fully visible.
ethische_implicaties: Watchfulness and alertness are required; one cannot be 'asleep' at the edge.
onbedoelde_consequenties: May suggest a dangerous instability or fear of the unknown.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the 'Advent' concept by using physical, spatial language ('nuzzle close', 'brink') rather than liturgical jargon.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon maintains a consistent 'Spatial-Temporal' framework where Elijah/Jesus is an 'intruder' into a stagnant space.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The preacher describes God/Elijah as both an active intruder and a missing guest.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: An intruder is present by definition; an absence is the lack of presence.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The 'Empty Chair' at the table serves as a physical anchor for the abstract concept of longing.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the 'Shepherd/Prophet' archetype through the lens of economic justice.
sterktes.voorbeeld: He thundered into the operation of the big winners.

risicos.beschrijving: By focusing heavily on 'healing families' and 'turning hearts', the cosmic/juridical weight of Malachi's 'Day of the Lord' (fire/judgment) is softened.
risicos.voorbeeld: He will reconcile the generations. He will heal our families.
risicos.potentiele_impact: The congregation may view the 'Day of the Lord' as family therapy rather than divine justice.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A landscape of 'scarcity' and 'frenzy' where a boundary line (Advent) separates the present from a 'big, disruptive coming'.
sub_worlds: The 800 BCE world of Elijah (widows, jars of oil)

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: Strong; creates a sense of continuity in hope.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Through the repetition of the 'abundance' vs 'scarcity' narrative.

verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: Advent as the 'Elijah Season' of preparation.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Perfectly aligns with the Advent theme of 'Waiting/Coming'.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is built on a 'Spatial-Economic' landscape. It successfully moves the hearer from a 'World of Scarcity' (the present) to a 'World of Abundance' (the coming Kingdom). The dominant metaphor is the 'Intrusive Absence', which functions as a paradox to keep the hearer in the tension of Advent.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Deepen the source domain of 'hunger' or 'thirst' to contrast with the 'jar of meal'.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: Consumerism is a salt-water drink that makes the thirst worse.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The 'Day of the Lord' as both a 'curse' (Malachi) and a 'healing' (Sermon).
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Explicitly blend the two: the fire of judgment is the heat that heals the wound.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: If we are at the 'edge', we are stationary.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Incorporate more 'walking' or 'turning' language to emphasize agency.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To build on the 'setting a place at the table' metaphor.
alternatieve_domeinen.doel_concept: The Church as a House with an open door.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to turn a 'dead' liturgical season into a 'living' spatial experience.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Focuses on the cognitive mapping of 'scarcity' rather than just the beauty of the Elijah stories.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Moves beyond 'experience/reflection' to analyze the underlying mental structures of the 'Advent' state.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals how the preacher uses 'Verticality' (High Mountain) and 'Containers' (Jar/Jug) to make abstract grace tangible.

appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the 'Prophetic Imagination'—a hallmark of Brueggemann-style homiletics.
